ShortUrl table

This component demonstrates fetching data from the server.

{{ url.targetUrl }} {{ url.shortUrl }} {{ url.userName }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { environment } from '../../environments/environment'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html', }) export class FetchDataComponent { public urls: Url[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'api/urls').subscribe({ next: (result) => { this.urls = result; }, error: (error) => { console.error(error); }, }); } } interface Url { id: number; targetUrl: string; shortUrl: string; userName: string; }
